name: tm21
effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Drain)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The less the user
likes you, the more
powerful this move.

The less the user

likes its TRAINER.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user turns the target’s power against it.
The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater
the damage it deals.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully
restores the user’s HP and heals any
status conditions.
